MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_TX_AVCRVE
MODULE.description:
AVC/RVE algorithm that is part of voice postprocessing on the#[ #] Tx path. This module is the Tx counterpart of VOICE_MODULE_RX_AVCRVE on the Rx path.
This module supports the following parameter#[ #] IDs
VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE
VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_V2
VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_TX

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_ENABLE
PARAMETER.description:
Enables the AVC/RVE algorithms.
Fixed size for this#[ #] parameter
Version 0 – 4 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ModeWord
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Mode word to decide#[ #] between RVE/AVC algorithms
1 – AVC is enabled
2 – RVE is enabled
All other values – Both AVC/RVE are disabled

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Must be set to 0

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE
PARAMETER.description:
AVC/RVE algorithm. 
Fixed size for this parameter 
Version 0 – 148#[ #] bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: RlinkSensitivityOffset
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Forward-link AVC variation from nominal sensitivity. This offset is applied to the background noise estimate before comparing against#[ #] the thresholds. Increasing this parameter makes the AVC more sensitive to background noise.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FlinkHeadroom
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Forward-link AVC#[ #] headroom. This is the maximum total output gain below the threshold that is allowed.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaNoise
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for#[ #] noise bands

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaRec
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for#[ #] primary channel noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: scaleFact_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor for#[ #] scaling single channel estimate bands greater than min

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: scaleFact_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor for#[ #] scaling second channel noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: opMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indicates if system is run#[ #] in Single mic mode (opmode = 1) or Dual mic mode (opmode = 2)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaRef
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for ref#[ #] (far end) bands

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaGainIncrease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for increasing gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaGainDecrease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] for decreasing gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaAmp
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for#[ #] amplitude in soft peak limiter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaPLAttack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] for peak limiter attack

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaPLDecay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] for peak limiter decay

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: lowGainLimit
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower gain limit#[ #] (linear). Set to headroom for tuning the echo canceller

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Headroom
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Headroom for#[ #] amplification (linear)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: peakLim
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Soft peak limiter#[ #] threshold; if 0, no peak limiting

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: hardPeakLim
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Hard peak#[ #] limiter amplitude; if 0, no peak limiting

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aeq_vad_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Far-end VAD#[ #] threshold

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ref_vad_hangover_max
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: VAD#[ #] hangover,10 ms increments

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noiseSensThresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sensitivity threshold for noise before gain update, per band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gainMultVector
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Multiplier for each filter bank gain (ratio offset)

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_V2
PARAMETER.description:
AVC/RVE version 2 algorithm, which upgrades the single-mic noise#[ #] estimate method to the minimum statistics method.
Fixed size for this parameter - 
Version 0 – 164 bytes 
Version 1 extension – 180 bytes#[ #]

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Read only element.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set#[ #] this value to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: RlinkSensitivityOffset
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Forward-link AVC variation from nominal sensitivity. This offset is applied to the background noise estimate before comparing against#[ #] the thresholds. Increasing this parameter makes the AVC more sensitive to background noise.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FlinkHeadroom
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Forward-link AVC#[ #] headroom. This is the maximum total output gain below the threshold that is allowed.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaNoise
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for#[ #] noise bands

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaRec
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for#[ #] primary channel noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: scaleFact_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor for#[ #] scaling single channel estimate bands greater than min

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: scaleFact_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor for#[ #] scaling second channel noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: opMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indicates if system is run#[ #] in Single mic mode (opmode = 1) or Dual mic mode (opmode = 2)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaRef
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for ref#[ #] (far end) bands

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaGainIncrease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for increasing gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaGainDecrease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] for decreasing gain

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaAmp
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for#[ #] amplitude in soft peak limiter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaPLAttack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] for peak limiter attack

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaPLDecay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing#[ #] for peak limiter decay

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: lowGainLimit
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lower gain limit#[ #] (linear). Set to headroom for tuning the echo canceller

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Headroom
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Headroom for#[ #] amplification (linear)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: peakLim
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Soft peak limiter#[ #] threshold; if 0, no peak limiting

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: hardPeakLim
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Hard peak#[ #] limiter amplitude; if 0, no peak limiting

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aeq_vad_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Far-end VAD#[ #] threshold

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ref_vad_hangover_max
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: VAD#[ #] hangover,10 ms increments

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noiseSensThresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sensitivity threshold for noise before gain update, per band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gainMultVector
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Multiplier for each filter bank gain (ratio offset)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sne_num_blk
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of#[ #] block size for minimum statistic noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sne_blk_size
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: The size of each block for minimum statistic noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sne_init_alpha_Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise smoothing factor for minimum statistic noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sne_overestimation_factor_Q13
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over noise estimate factor for minimum statistic noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: hangoverSubBand
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Hangover (number of frames to wait before decreasing gain) for each band.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noiseSensThreshFB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Sensitivity threshold for noise before gain update, per band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gainMultVectorFB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Multiplier#[ #] for each filter bank gain (ratio offset)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gainAdaptNumBands
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: If#[ #] Tx_Noise_reference is 8k, should be set to 4. If Tx_noise_reference is greater 8k, should be set to some value no larger than 6.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_TX
PARAMETER.description:
AVC/RVE tx algorithm, which upgrades the single-mic noise estimate#[ #] method to the minimum statistics method.
Fixed size for this parameter - 
Version 0 – 112 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Read only element.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gainAdaptNumBands
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: If#[ #] Tx_Noise_reference is 8k, should be set to 4. If Tx_noise_reference is greater 8k, should be set to some value no larger than 6.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: RlinkSensitivityOffset
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Forward-link AVC variation from nominal sensitivity. This offset is applied to the background noise estimate before comparing against#[ #] the thresholds. Increasing this parameter makes the AVC more sensitive to background noise.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FlinkHeadroom
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Forward-link AVC#[ #] headroom. This is the maximum total output gain below the threshold that is allowed.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaNoise
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for#[ #] noise bands

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smAlphaRec
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing for#[ #] primary channel noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: scaleFact_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor for#[ #] scaling single channel estimate bands greater than min

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: scaleFact_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Factor for#[ #] scaling second channel noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: opMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indicates if system is run#[ #] in Single mic mode (opmode = 1) or Dual mic mode (opmode = 2)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sne_num_blk
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of#[ #] block size for minimum statistic noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sne_blk_size
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: The size of each block for minimum statistic noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sne_init_alpha_Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Noise smoothing factor for minimum statistic noise estimate

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sne_overestimation_factor_Q13
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Over noise estimate factor for minimum statistic noise estimate

MODULE.description:
AVC/RVE algorithm in the voice preprocessor on the Rx#[ #] path.
This module supports the following parameter IDs
VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE
VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_V2
VOICE_PARAM_AVC_RVE_RX#[ #]
